sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Card class="border energy-ratio">
    <template #title> Energy Ratio </template>
    <template #content>
          <Chart
            type="doughnut"
            :data="chartData"
            width="150"
            :options="lightOptions"
          />
    </template>
  </Card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  mounted() {
  },
  data() {
    return {
      chartData: {
        labels: ['Fats', 'Carbs', 'Protein'],
        datasets: [
          {
            data: [30, 400, 100],
            backgroundColor: ["#50514F", "#23CE6B", "#A846A0"],
          },
        ],
      },
      lightOptions: {
        plugins: {
          legend: {
            labels: {
              color: "#50514F",
            },
          },
        },
      },
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.border {
  border-top: 8px solid var(--gray);
  height: 250px;
}

.energy-ratio {
  max-height: 300px;
}
</style>
